fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Assail a player, attacking them and lowering their attack value by one stage tonight.
- Twice per game, summon a galestorm, allowing you to assail three players tonight instead of one. They can all target the same player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- By default, your attacks deal no damage. However, if your target has already been attacked (attacks from other sources are factored in) two times already, you will deal a basic attack. After that, every successive attack increases in attack value by one stage, up to Unstoppable.
- If an attack with a value of none targets a player with a defence of none, they will receive according messages that indicate the target's defence was too high.
